title: Halsey flashes her fit and toned abs while shooting commercial in New York City
text:
The video for her new single Graveyard has racked up over 3.3 million views since debuting only 24 hours ago.

And rain, hail or shine the work continued for Halsey on Wednesday, spotted filming a Beats by Dre commercial in Manhattan, New York's Soho area.

The 25-year-old singer braved the cold October weather and rain while flaunting her toned stomach in a cropped top.

Fit and toned! Halsey flashed her toned abs on Wednesday when she was spotted in New York City shooting a commercial for Beats By Dre

Halsey rocked a cream colored crop that featured a large oval cut out above her breasts underneath a tan colored teddy style jacket.

She teamed her look with a pair of checkered straight legged trousers that were of an olive green color.

The Without You singer's look was complete with fresh white sneakers and an umbrella to shield herself from the rain.

Gorgeous: Halsey rocked a cream colored crop that featured a large oval cut out above her breasts underneath a tan colored teddy style jacket

Stylish: She teamed her look with a pair of checkered straight legged trousers that were of an olive green color

All dressed up: Halsey's dark tresses were slicked back behind her ears and parted to one side

Halsey's dark tresses were slicked back behind her ears and parted to one side.

Her glam featured a matte complexion with blushed cheeks, shimmery eyes, fake lashes and a nude lip.

Halsey's New York appearance comes after she spent the past few days in Santorini, Greece, to celebrate her birthday.

Beauty: Her glam featured a matte complexion with blushed cheeks, shimmery eyes, fake lashes and a nude lip

A big 24 hours! The video for her new single Graveyard has racked up over 3.3 million views since debuting only 24 hours ago

Stay tuned: Halsey's new album, Manic, is set to be released in early 2020

She shared a stunning photo of her enviable curves on Thursday thanking her fans for all their wishes.

'thanks for the bday wishes past few days. <3 my belly doesn’t look like this anymore cause I ate so much baklava,' she joked.

Halsey — who's real name is Ashley Nicolette Frangipane — rocked a skin-tight beige skirt which rested across her hips.

Halsey's new album, Manic, is set to be released in early 2020.
description: Halsey flashed her toned abs on Wednesday when she was spotted in New York City shooting a commercial for Beats By Dre.
